comments:
Steps to reproduce:
1) Download, unzip and start fresh eclipse
2) "Help"->"Software Updates"->"Find and Install..."
3) "Search for new features to install"
4) Check the "Callisto Discovery Site" (as an example, but it doesn't matter which site you pick)
5) Choose the Mirror Site

Results:

If I start eclipse with "-nl en_US" or change Windows locale to English, everything works fine.

When running Windows with Swedish locale (English Windows install) I get this message: "No features found on the selected site(s). Choose a different site or site category.". There are nothing logged in the .log file, but in the console I see the stacktraces below.

I suspect this is a duplicate of bug #134690, because of the same java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar.formatHelper().

I have reproduced this on 3.2rc1 as well as I20060419-1640.
